decks.notes: This Jund Aggro deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice synergies to overwhelm opponents with creature removal and deal damage efficiently. The key strategy revolves around sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and using cards like Mayhem Devil to deal additional damage. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and claim the Firstborn to maintain board control. By utilizing the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring, the deck gains access to additional resources and a versatile creature to enhance its aggressive game plan.

This Gruul Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents with fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary, along with powerful burn spells like Atarka's Command and Play with Fire, the deck can apply early pressure and finish off opponents quickly. Den of the Bugbear and Ramunap Ruins provide additional reach, while cards like Reckless Bushwhacker and Heartfire Hero can provide a final burst of damage to secure the win. The deck's focus is on fast, proactive plays to dominate the battlefield and close out games swiftly.

The focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's resources through discard spells like Thoughtseize, removal spells like Fatal Push, and board wipes such as Sheoldred's Edict. The deck also aims to maintain card advantage with cards like Sign in Blood and Liliana of the Veil, while utilizing powerful finishers like Archfiend of the Dross to close out the game. The inclusion of cards like Graveyard Trespasser and Cling to Dust also allows for graveyard interaction, further enhancing the control elements of the deck.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board while ramping up mana to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck utilizes cards like Lotus Cobra and Nissa, Resurgent Animist for ramp, while also running removal and protection spells like Portable Hole and Leyline Binding. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to establish board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix and put pressure on the opponent. With cards like Ledger Shredder and Picklock Prankster to assist in discarding, along with spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse for removal, the goal is to continuously bring back the Phoenix and go for a fast win. The deck also includes card draw spells like Consider and Opt to help maintain momentum, while utilizing efficient lands like Steam Vents and Riverglide Pathway for mana fixing.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly building up a board presence with efficient creatures like Bishop of Wings, Righteous Valkyrie, and Skyclave Apparition. The deck also utilizes Collected Company to dig for more threats. The mana base includes dual lands like Branchloft Pathway and Razorverge Thicket to ensure smooth mana production. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of flying creatures, lifegain, and removal spells, ultimately leading to a quick victory through aggressive plays.

This Pioneer 1 vs 1 deck revolves around using artifacts and aggro strategies to quickly overwhelm opponents. By utilizing cards like Ensoul Artifact, Shrapnel Blast, and Smuggler's Copter, the deck aims to deal damage efficiently and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an additional layer of consistency to the deck. With a mix of artifact creatures, removal spells, and mana fixing cards, this deck is designed to be proactive and aggressive from the start.
